name: budget-tracker
description: Personal Budget Tracker with Plaid Integration

scripts.build: npm run minify && npm run copy-assets && npm run build-prod-html
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist && mkdir -p dist/css && cp css/styles.css dist/css/ && cp config.js dist/ && cp sw.js dist/ && cp -r js dist/ && mkdir -p dist/workers && cp workers/*.js dist/workers/ 2>/dev/null || true
